title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:
Introducing the Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, your perfect all-in-one solution for creating a magical and enchanting atmosphere in any setting! This 1 pack of Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights is a must-have for Bedrooms, Christmas celebrations, Parties, Weddings, or any other special occasion.

Bask in the warm, inviting glow of 50 rice grain-sized LEDs that emit a beautiful 360-degree warm white light, perfect for adding a touch of charm to your decorations. The flexible and sturdy 16ft (5m) copper wire allows you to shape and mold these lights into any design, making them easy to hide and blend seamlessly with your decor.

These energy-efficient LEDs produce no heat, ensuring safety and comfort. The battery box is clear and small, requiring 3 AA batteries (not included), and is easy to hide with its 12-inch cable length. Plus, these fairy lights are waterproof, making them perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

Experience the joy of hassle-free decorating with Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated. With a 360-degree viewing angle and a 4-inch distance between each LED, these lights will illuminate your space and create a starry, fairy-tale ambiance.

And rest assured, our professional customer service team is available to assist you with any questions or concerns. Purchase with confidence, knowing that returns are accepted via Amazon.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to transform your Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Weddings, Centerpieces, and Decorations with the magic of Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated!
